commands.cmd:
echo '-----------------------------------------------------' &&
nasm -f elf ${relativeFile} && 
echo 'nasm compile.' && 
ld -m elf_i386 -s -o ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExt}.sh ${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExt}.o && 
echo 'ld compile.' && 
echo 'ESTO SOLO SIRVE PARA LINUX 64BITS' && 
echo '-----------------------------------------------------'
